item.title: Master command [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @B0SS B0SS
item.description:
@B0SS wrote:

how can i make it so ::master only gives certain skills, right now i have it at this

if (command[0].equals("master")); player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.ATTACK, 100000000); player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.STRENGTH, 100000000); player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.DEFENCE, 100000000); player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.HITPOINTS, 100000000); player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.RANGE, 100000000); player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.MAGIC, 100000000); player.getSkills().addExperience(Skills.PRAYER, 100000000); but whenever i try to use another commands it still gives me all those 99’s up top (example: i use this command “::reset” and it still gives me all those 99’s up top even though im not using the command "::master"
EDIT:[FIXED] just needed to fix the brackets up a little better

Read full topic
